casebody.data:
SPENCER & CO. v. UNITED STATES. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 11, 1907.) No. 118 (3,953). Appeal from the Circuit Court of the United States for the Southern District of New York. For decision below, see 143 Fed. 916, affirming a decision of the Board of United States General Appraisers (G. A. 5,943; T. D. 26,090), which affirmed the assess-' ment of duty by the collector of customs at the port of New York. Comstock & Washburn (Albert H. Washburn, of counsel), for importers. J. Osgood Nichols, Asst. U. S. Atty.

Before WALLACE, TOWNSEND, and CONE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed, on opinion of Circuit Court and Board of General Appraisers.
